sentence.text: In a mouse model of colitis-associated colon cancer (carnitine shuttle), urine level of D2HG during colitis correlates positively with subsequent polyp counts and severity of dysplasia.
The colonic expression of response to manganese ion is decreased in ulcerative colitis (UC) patients at baseline who progress to cancer.
Our study identifies urine D2HG and tissue response to manganese ion expression as biomarkers to identify patients at risk for progressing from colitis to cancer.
